texts.es: Liset, originaria de Telica municipio de León, de oficio comerciante dueña de una pequeña Pulpería. Nos comparte su primera experiencia con el préstamo Kiva pues fue muy positiva para ella. Ya que surtió su pulpería con productos tales como granos básicos, aceite, productos de limpieza pues son elemento de mucha necesidad en su comunidad. Ahora ella solicita un segundo credito para invertir en pollo, pan, gaseosas, verduras y comprar una vitrina pues tiene pensado vender ropa para hacer variada su pulpería. Ya que al diversificar y ofrecerlo algo nuevo a tus clientes las ventas mejoran y negocio también.
texts.en:
Liset, who is originally from Telica in the León municipality, is in business running a small convenience store.  She shares with us that her first experience with a loan from Kiva was a very positive one.  She stocked up her convenience store with products such as basic grains, oil, and cleaning products, as these were in great need in her community.

She is now requesting a second loan to invest in chicken, bread, sodas, and vegetables, and to purchase a display case as she is thinking about selling clothing to provide variety in her convenience store.  This will provide diversification and offer something new to her customers, increasing both her sales and her business.

loans.use: to purchase chicken, bread, sodas, vegetables, and to purchase a display case.

loans.name: Fazilamo

texts.ru: Фазиламо жительница города Куляб. Она занимается торговлей на рынке. В основном она продает игрушки и детскую одежду. Этим видом бизнеса она занимается четыре года. Фазиламо 44 года. Она замужем. У нее четверо детей. Она берет кредит для покупки детских костюмчиков.
texts.en:
Fazilamo lives in the city of Kulob. She's forty-four years old, married and has four children. 
For the past four years she has worked as a salesperson on a market. The majority of her merchandise consists of toys and children's clothing. She's asking for a loan in order to purchase some garments for children.

loans.use: to purchase children's clothing.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is a 43-year-old Lebanese married man who lives with wife and only one daughter. He cooperates with his child to fulfill his family needs and cover the heavy costs of life. He started his own business in 1993 and still has it. He sells women's lingerie on a free-lance basis and has his own customers always asking for his new and stylish products. Today, he’s asking to borrow $1,500 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase added lingerie products for his work. In that way, he will be able to increase his sales and thus his earnings. In the future, he plans to open new branches in different areas.

loans.use: to purchase added lingerie products to sell

loans.name: Bobomurod

texts.ru: Бобомурод житель Яванского района. Ему 53 года. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Его жена и сын работают в дехканском хозяйстве. Другой его сын работает в Российской Федерации. Он сам занимается скотоводством. Этим видом деятельности занимается 15 лет. Целью получения кредита является закуп бычков для откорма и продажи.
texts.en:
Bobomurod lives in the Yavan region. He's fifty-three years, married and has five children. His wife and one of his sons work on a privatized (dekhan) farm. Another one of his sons works in Russia. 
Bobomurod breeds animals for a living, a business he's been involved in for the last fifteen years. A loan will allow him to purchase some bull-calves for fattening and resale.

loans.use: to purchase bull-calves.

loans.name: Abduhakim

texts.ru: Абдухаким примерный трудолюбивый молодой человек. Он женат и него растут четверо прекрасных детей. Для обеспечения своей семьи он занимается откормом скота. Этот бизнес для него удачен. Он получает хорошую прибыль от продажи скота. Корм и помещение для него есть. Он хочет получить займ в размере 6000 сомони и приобрести еще несколько голов крупного рогатого скота. Он надеется на вашу поддержку и милосердие спасибо.
texts.en: Abduhakim is an exemplary, hardworking young man.  He is married and is raising four beautiful children.  In order to provide for his family, he is involved in fattening up livestock.  This is a successful business for him.  Abduhakim makes a good profit from sales of livestock.  He has space and fodder for the livestock.  Abduhakim wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 6000 somoni to purchase several heads of cattle.  He relies on your support and mercy.  Thank you.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en: Hasan is a 46-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and four children. Two of them are working while the other two children are still attending school. He’s the one responsible for covering his family's needs and paying his children’s educational fees. He began to work as an electrician in 1982. He also visits customers at home. Today, he’s requesting to borrow $2,600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase new tools for his business, such as electrical cables. He notes that this will help him serve a wider range of people and earn a higher income. In the future, he plans to open his own electrical products shop.

loans.use: to purchase new tools for his business such as electrical cables

loans.name: Foziljon

texts.ru: Фозилчон более пяти лет занимается скотоводством. Он разводит крупнорогатый скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Ему 37 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Он берет кредит для закупа бычков.
texts.en: Foziljon has been involved in animal husbandry for over five years.  He breeds cattle for subsequent sale.  He is 37 years old, married and has three children.  Foziljon is requesting this loan to purchase bulls.

loans.use: to purchase bulls

loans.name: Marinela Del Socorro

texts.es: La Joven Marinela a sus 26 años de edad es madre de tres hijos de 5 y 4 años de edad y un bebe recién nacido de tres meses, por los cuales trabaja diariamente para conseguir su sustento y apoyar económicamente a su esposo. La Joven Marinela se dedica a la venta de mercancía tal como productos cosméticos por catálogo desde hace cinco años, esta actividad la inicio con el objetivo de buscar mejorar los ingresos para el sustento de su familia, la joven Marinela cuenta con una clientela establecida entre los vecinos de la vereda, familiares y amigos del municipio del Carmen de Viboral localizado al oriente de Antioquia. Con el fin de recuperar la mercancía perdida entre los clientes que no le han pagado, la señora Marinela necesita de la compra de más mercancía que pueda ofrecer a nuevos clientes y así mejorar el bienestar de su familia y cumplir su sueño de tener su propio almacén.
texts.en: Young Marinela, 26, is the mother of 3 children aged 5, 4 and a newborn baby who is 3 months old.  She works each day for them, in order to provide for them and support her husband financially.  Young Marinela has had a business selling merchandise, such as cosmetic products through a catalog, for 5 years.  She started in this line of work with the goal of seeking a better income to support her family. Young Marinela has an established customer base, between the neighbors in her village, relatives and friends from the municipality of Carmen de Viboral, located to the east of Antioquia.  In order to recover the merchandise she lost when she had customers who did not pay her, Marinela needs to buy more merchandise to offer to new customers, and in this way improve the well-being of her family and accomplish her goal of having her own store.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, such as body creams and perfumes

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en:
Hussein is a 29-year-old Lebanese engaged man. He’s living with his parents and three siblings, one of whom is working. His father is the main income provider in the family and is taking care of it. In 2009, Hussein opened his paint shop, where he sells all kinds of paints. In parallel, he has been installing air conditioners for the past three years and still does. 

Today, he’s in need of a loan of $1,600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase the needed quantity of paint for his shop. In that way, he will be capable to respond rapidly to his customers' demands and therefore get higher returns. In the future, he plans to sell paint to the neighboring shops.

loans.use: to purchase the needed quantity of paint for his shop.

loans.name: Narzullo

texts.ru: Нарзулло женат и любящий отец пятерых детей. Более 15 лет занимается купле продажей сухофруктов и выращиванием веников. Товар покупает из Тулского района Киргизии, в месяц 2-3 раза ездит за товаром. В основном привозит урюк и курагу. В бизнесе помогает сын. Также дома жена и невестка помогают в приготовлении связки  веников. Нарзулло запрашивает займ для закупа кураги. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Narzullo is married and is loving father of five children.  He has been involved in buying and selling dried fruits and producing brooms for over 15 years.  He buys goods from the Tulsk district of Kyrgyzstan and travels there 2-3 times per month.  He primarily brings in whole and halved dried apricots. His son helps him with the business.  Narzullo'a wife and daughter-in-law also help him with preparing bunches of brooms.  Narzullo is requesting this loan to purchase dried apricots.  He relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy dried apricots

loans.name: Daler

texts.ru: Далер умный и перспективный человек. Он женат и ответственный отец двоих детей. Более 10 лет он занимается скотоводством. Он покупает скот на местном рынке, затем откармливает их и продает за выгодную цену. Кроме того он имеет арендованную землю, там где выращивает сельхозкультуры. В бизнесе помогает жена. Далер хотел бы получить займ в размере 7000 Сомони для покупки крупного рогатого скота.
texts.en: Daler is a smart and promising young man.  He is married and is a responsible father of two children.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for over 10 years.  Daler buys livestock at the local market, then fattens it and sells it at a profitable price.  Besides this, he has leased land, where he grows agricultural crops.  His wife helps him with the business.  Daler wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 7000 Somoni to purchase cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Jaimer

texts.es:
Jaimer tiene 40 años, es padre de 02 hijos, Soledad de 08 años y Deysi de 05 años por quienes vela a diario. Convive con Ernestina de 31 años y cuentan con una casa propia. Jaimer desde muy pequeño sus padres le inculcaron a ganarse la vida, el tuvo una infancia muy dura de la cual tuvo que salir a base de valor trabajo y perseverancia. Hace 21 años se independizó de la mano de sus padres y abrió su propio negocio, una tienda de abarrotes. Empezó vendiendo sus productos poco a poco y con el transcurso del tiempo mas sus ahorros acumulados compró su propio lote de terreno donde actualmente se sitúa vendiendo para los pobladores de su comunidad. Jaimer es un hombre de armas tomar y señala que uno logra su propósito a base de perseverancia. 
Hoy se siente a gusto con la actividad que realiza y con los buenos ingresos que obtiene, es mas tiene casi todo de los productos lo que sus clientes requieren y a esto sumarle el detalle que ella las pone y la buena atención al cliente. Jaimer necesita el crédito para seguir prosperando y prestando buen servicio a sus consumidores. Necesita comprar productos de abarrotes para incrementar su tienda y sabe que lo logrará gracias al apoyo de los financistas. Este es el crédito número 13 con MFP, esta muy contento de saber que obtendrá apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de comprar lo sugerido y está muy contento  de pertenecer  a su banca comunal. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles; comprará productos abarrotes para incrementar su tienda.
texts.en:
Jaimer is 40, and the father of two children, Soledad, 8, and Deysi, 5, that he looks after every day. He lives with his partner Ernestina, 31, and they have their own house. Jaimer's parents taught him to earn a living from a young age. He had a very difficult childhood, that he had to overcome through hard work and perseverance.  

He became independent of his parents 21 years ago, and opened his own business, a grocery store.  He began selling his products little by little, and with the passage of time, and his accumulated savings, he bought his own plot of land, where he is now established and selling to the people of the community.

Jaimer is a determined man, and says that one achieves one's aim through perseverance. Today he feels happy with the work he does, and the good income he gets. He has almost all the products that his customers need, and to this he adds thoughfulness and good customer service.

Jaimer needs the loan to continue prospering, and delivering good service to his customers. He needs to buy grocery products to add to his store, and knows that he will manage to do it thanks to the support of the lenders. This is his 13th loan with MFP, and he is very happy to know that he will get financial support, as that way he will feel sure of buying the suggested products.  

He is very happy to belong to the communal bank. With the 3,000 nuevos soles, he will buy grocery products to add to his store.

loans.use: To buy products for stocking his grocery store.

loans.name: Davron

texts.ru: Даврон женат и ответственный отец четверых детей. Более 6 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота. Жена является колхозницей. В месяц 1-2 раза ездит на рынок Шурнава, покупает скот и в течении двух недель откармливает его, и снова продает за хорошую цену. От этого бизнеса получает хорошую прибыль. Кроме того он является мастером- плотником. В собственном доме имеет столярный станок для изготовлением окон и дверей. Даврон хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота с целью расширения своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Davron is married and is a responsible father of four children.  He has been involved in buying and selling livestock for over six years.  His wife is a farmer.  Davron travels to the Shurnava market 1-2 times per month, buys livestock and fattens it up over the course of two weeks, and then sells it again at a good price.  He makes a good profit from this business.  Besides this, he is a master carpenter.  He has carpentry machinery in his own house and makes doors and windows.  Davron wants to obtain a loan to purchase livestock in order to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Rami

texts.en:
Rami is a 33-year-old Lebanese married man. He lives with his wife and two children. He’s trying his best to satisfy his family and to show help whenever they need it. 

Rami has been working as a plumber for the past fifteen years. He works independently and visits his customers at home from time to time. Today, he’s looking to borrow $1300 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to buy the needed equipment for his business. This will help him to take more projects and to gain added customers. In the future, he plans to improve his job and take bigger projects.

loans.use: to buy the needed equipment for his business.

loans.name: Mirvate

texts.en: Mirvate is a 27-year-old Lebanese married woman living with her husband and three children. Her husband has his own car and motorcycle show room. He is the main source of income for his family and his income is their only financial support. As for Mirvate, she has been working as a hair dresser from her home since 2008. She also visits her clients upon request. Today, she needs to borrow $3000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase a new car for her business. She notes that this will facilitate her transportation and allow her to serve more customers. In the future, she plans to open her own salon.

loans.use: to purchase a new car for her business.

loans.name: Guadalupe Del Rosario

texts.es:
Guadalupe, es una mujer trabajadora que tiene muchas aspiraciones en los años próximos de prosperar en su pequeña tienda.

Comenzó con el negocio vendiendo pequeñas cosas poco a poco comenzó a tener ingresos. Ahora ella trabaja en su tienda vendiendo víveres variados.  

Tiene muchas aspiraciones por eso quiere continuar su tienda. Por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar vivieres para la tienda como arroz, aceites, bebidas, granos etc.
texts.en:
Guadalupe is a hard-working woman who has many ambitions for prospering in her small store in the coming years. She started with her business by selling small things, and gradually began to earn income. 

Now she works in her store selling a variety of foodstuffs. She has many ambitions, and that's why she wants to continue with her store. So she wants the loan to buy foodstuffs for the store, such as rice, cooking oils, drinks, grains, etc.

loans.use: To buy rice, cooking oils, drinks, and grains.

loans.name: Haidar

texts.en: Haidar is a 43-year-old Lebanese married man. He lives with his wife and only one child. He’s the main income provider for his family and is seeking to enhance their way of living. In the year 2000, he opened his own shoe shop where he also fixes the broken ones in order to deliver good quality products for his customers. Today, he’s asking for a loan of $700 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase a new collection of shoes for his shop. This Kiva loan will improve his business, thus his revenues. In the future, he plans to open his own shoe factory.

loans.use: to purchase a new collection of shoes for his shop

loans.name: Noel

texts.es: Noel  tiene 64 años de edad, es una persona asalariada su mayor sueño es acondicionar su vivienda  que ya necesidad realizar la mejoras. El ya no tiene hijos a cargo de él, sus hijos lo ayudan económicamente. Actualmente está solicitando crédito para poder realizar las mejoras de la vivienda que habita lo cual comprar pintura, cementos entre otras cosas.
texts.en: Noel is 64 years old.  He is a wage-earning person.  His greatest dream is to equip his home that already needs improvements.  He no longer has children in his care.  His children help him financially.  He is currently asking for a loan to be able to carry out the improvements on his house that he lives in.  He will buy paint, cements, and other things.

loans.use: buy paint, cement, and other things.

loans.name: Rafee

texts.en: Rafee is a 29-year-old Lebanese single man.  He lives with his parents and his two working siblings.  His father is doing the best he can to fulfill their needs.  For this reason, Rafee decided to help his father with their expenses, so he opened his own cell phone shop with a lotto machine in 2005.  Today, he has the intention to borrow $1600 from Kiva partner Ameen S.a.l to purchase an updated collection of cellphones for his shop.  With his updated inventory, he will be able to attract a wider range of people and develop his business.  In the future, he plans to enlarge his shop to include new items such as televisions, laptops, and many more.

loans.use: to purchase the updated collection of cellphones for his shop

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
el sr. José tiene 37 años de edad, esta casado y es padre de 4 hijos.  Su actividad principal es la venta de mariscos, embutidos y carnes, su negocio es uno de los mas fuertes de la zona de jamastran ya que cuenta con varios distribuidores que venden su producto en motocicletas a lo largo y ancho del valle de jamastran y en la montaña, cuenta con mucha experiencia en el manejo de su negocio,  el tiene el lema que "sus clientes son primero" por lo que se esmera en ofrecerles un buen producto, de buena calidad y buen precio.
sus mariscos los compra en la zona de San Lorenzo Valle.
El Sr. Jose utilizara el credito para la compra de mariscos, embutidos y carnes, tiene bastante demanda y no logra salir con todos los pedidos, ya que no tiene el capital suficiente para surtir bien su negocio.
texts.en:
José is 37 years old, married, and the father of 4 children.  His main activity is selling seafood, sausage, and meats.  His business is one of the strongest in the Jamastran area.  He counts on various distributors that sell his products on motorcycles far and wide from the Jamastran Valley to the mountain.  He has much experience managing his business.  He has the motto that "his customers come first" because he tries very hard to offer them a good product of good quality and at a good price.
He buys his seafood in the zone of the San Lorenzo Valley.
José will use the loan to buy seafood, sausage, and meats.  He has enough demand, and he is not able to keep up with all the orders since he does not have enough capital to adequately supply his business.

loans.use: buy seafood, sausage, and meats.

loans.name: Abdurahim

texts.ru: Абдурахим житель города Куляб. Ему 52 года. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Двое его сыновей работают вместе с ним. Сам он имеет среднее образование. Он занимается торговлей запасных частей автомобилей. Торговлей Абдурахим занимается одиннадцать лет. Кредит берет для приобретения запчастей грузовых автомобилей.
texts.en: Abdurahim lives in the town of Kulob.  He is 52 years old, married, and has five children.  His wife is a housewife.  His two sons work with him.  Abdurahim has a high school education.  He sells automobile spare parts, and has been involved in this business for eleven years.  He is requesting a loan in order to purchase spare parts for trucks.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for trucks.

loans.name: Kamal

texts.en: Kamal is a 35-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and two school-aged children.  He’s working really hard to be able to pay his children’s educational fees.  He has been working as a constructor for the past eleven years.  He’s a reputable person and well known for his professionalism at work.  Today, he wants to borrow $2000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l in order to purchase wood for his business.  This Kiva loan will allow him to carry on his work as it should be.  In the future, he plans to take on more projects inside and outside his country.

loans.use: to purchase wood for his business.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad, 28 years old and married, works in the data entry department a court building.
 
Since Ahmad was a young boy he has bought birds and raised and sold them with his father. They kept on doing that until Ahmad got married and was busy with his work. 

But his father never left this business, and now Ahmad has missed the old days. He has decided to start all over again with his father a trading business buying and selling birds. For that he has applied for a youth loan.

loans.use: To buy birds for his new business.

loans.name: Majd

texts.en:
Majd is a 23-year-old single man who opened his own women's clothes store in Al Karak a year ago.

Majd chose to start with high-quality clothes so he could attract customers easily. He maintains that level whenever he brings in a new collection of clothes.

Today, Majd has applied for a youth loan to bring in more clothes and expand his shop space so he can make more profit to build a strong base for his future.

loans.use: to bring in more clothes and expand his shop space.

loans.name: Mamoun

texts.en:
Mamoun, a 20-year-old single man, has four brothers and two sisters.

His father opened a small supermarket in their neighborhood three years ago and started to teach Mamoun so he can run this business on his own. 

Now the supermarket is Mamoun’s, and he has enhanced the internal decoration so it can fit more products and maintain a good look for the market.

Mamoun has applied for a youth loan today to buy more food products for his store so he can have a wide collection of products.

loans.use: to buy more food products for his store.

loans.name: Jihad

texts.en:
Jihad is a 22-year-old single man. He is the second youngest child in a family of eight members.
Two years ago, following his passion for cars, Jihad was able to open a small shop selling car accessories. At first his customers were mainly his friends but then people started to come to his shop to buy accessories and ask for advice about what should they buy or do to accessorize their cars. 
Today, Jihad has applied for a youth loan to buy more car accessories and cleaning products for cars.

loans.use: to buy more car accessories for resale.

loans.name: Omar

texts.en:
Omar, a 20-year-old man, started a small retail business at home three years ago buying and selling clothes, perfumes and other items. Using his negotiation skills, he can get a good offer for the products that he sells and he can sell them easily using his connections.

Now Omar want to start working on expanding his business and opening his own store. Therefore, he applied for a youth loan to buy a larger quantity of perfumes and clothes as a start.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of perfumes and clothes

loans.name: Rasha

texts.en:
Rasha, 27 years old, is a married lady. Her husband works as a private driver.

Rasha recently started buying cosmetic products and selling them to her friends and relatives. She wants to expand her business so she can reach more people and one day open her own cosmetics store.

To be able to achieve her goal, she has applied for a youth loan in order to buy more cosmetic products to sell and reach more customers in the neighborhood for now.

loans.use: to buy more cosmetic products to sell

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en:
Hussein is a 21-year-old Lebanese single man living with his parents and one sibling. His father is the one taking care of the family and covering their heavy life expenses. 

Despite his young age, Hussein started his own business in 2006 as a car mechanic. He has gained a fair number of customers asking for his services, especially after having eleven years of experience in this domain. 

In parallel, he transports students in his own van. 

Today, he needs to borrow $1,100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase additional mechanical equipment for his shop such as wheels and many other spare parts. 

He believes that acting properly and honestly is really essential to build a good and solid career. In the future, he plans to enlarge his garage in order to serve more clients.

loans.use: to purchase mechanical equipment for his shop such as wheels and many other spare parts.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is 49 years old, married and has five children. He sells fruits and vegetables to earn a living. He has been in this business for nine years and employs one person. He earns extra income from farming activities. 
Since James joined Kiva partner Faulu Kenya, he has been able to educate his children. He hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for a loan of 30,000 Kenyan Shillings (KES) to buy vegetables and fruits.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and fruits.

loans.name: Deyanira Del Socorro

texts.es: Deyanira es una emprendedora que se le ha apoyado en el financiamiento para surtir su negocio que es una pulpería en el cual ella nos expresa que con el financiamiento que se le brindo surtió su negocio con variedad de producto que sus clientes le solicitan. Actualmente está solicitando financiamiento para nuevamente surtirse y comprar granos básicos, jabón, detergentes, jugos, refrescos y pan que son productos muy necesarios en cada hogar y de calidad.
texts.en: Deyanira is an entrepreneur who has been supported with financing to stock her business, a small grocery store. She tells us that with the loan her business was able to have a variety of products that her customers ask her for. At present, she is asking for a loan again to stock up and buy basic grains, soap, detergent, juice, drinks and bread, which are products that are very necessary in every home and are of good quality.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, sopa, detergent, juices, drinks and bread, the products that are most in demand.

loans.name: Sahar

texts.en: Sahar is a 47-year-old Lebanese married woman living with her husband and three children. Two of them are still studying while the other one is working. She collaborates with her husband to cover their expenses and enhance their way of living. Sahar opened her own supermarket in 1996, and noticed that it is a good way to earn superior income. As for her husband, he has been working on his own for the past fifteen years. Today, she’s looking for a loan of $2,100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to add new inventory for her business such as dairy products, soft drinks, canned bottles and many other items. This Kiva loan will increase her revenues by 15%. In the future, she plans to further develop her supermarket by adding extra products to it.

loans.use: to add new inventory for her business such as dairy products, soft drinks, canned bottles and many other items

loans.name: Yehya

texts.en: Yehya is a 19-year-old man. He’s unmarried, living with his parents and three working siblings. His father is working under pressure and seeking to offer them a respectable way of living. Unlike other people in his age, Yehya was ready to take responsibility and start his own business. So he opened a cellphones shop in 2008 where he also sells recharge cards and all related accessories. Today, and in order to organize and facilitate his business operations, he decided to borrow $500 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l in order to purchase a new laptop for his business. In the future, he plans to open new branches in several areas.

loans.use: to purchase a new laptop for his business.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en: Julius, a 38-year-old married father of three children, has been running a retail shop to earn a living for 15 years and employs two people. He earns extra income from his farming activities. Since joining Faulu Kenya, Julius has been able to expand his business and is now requesting a loan of 80,000 Kenya Shillings to buy sugar, rice and sodas. He hopes to own a wholesale shop in the future.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice and sodas.

loans.name: Eymin Johilia

texts.es: Eylimin Johilia es una emprendedora que inicia su propio negocio con el deseo de salir adelante, no es la primera vez que está solicitando financiamiento en el crédito anterior ella invirtió en mercadería en el cual aumento su inventario y sus clientes. Actualmente está solicitando financiamiento para invertir en mercadería en general en la compra de polvos, cremas, perfumes y tratamientos entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Eymin Johila is an entrepreneurial woman who has started her own cosmetics business with the hope of getting ahead in life. This is not the first time that she requests a loan. In her previous loan she invested in stock which increased her product range and her customers. 

This time she is requesting a loan in order to invest in general stock, buying powders, creams, perfumes and treatments, among other products.

loans.use: to buy powders, creams, perfumes and treatments, among other products.

loans.name: Fadi

texts.en: Fadi is a married 43-year-old Lebanese man. He lives with his wife and two children. He strives to work really hard with the cooperation of his wife in order to enrich their way of living and cover the heavy costs of life. Fadi began his work as a furniture painter in 2007 and has 20 years of experience in this domain. He has gained clients from different areas because of his good, well-organized work. His wife is working as a teacher at a local school. Today, he’s requesting to borrow $1,100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase new painting tools and brushes for his business in order to gain more customers and, thus, higher income. In the future, he plans to open his own furniture gallery.

loans.use: to purchase new painting tools and brushes for his business

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 24-year-old Lebanese man who is engaged. He lives with his only living parent and brother. 

In addition to his family expenses, Ali is also working hard to save money so he can get married and have his own family. He has been working for four years as a plumber. His job consists of repairing water pumps upon customers' requests. 

Today, Ali needs to borrow $900 from Kiva partner Ameen S.A.L. to purchase the needed equipment for his business such as pipe lines, keys and  others. He says that this will improve his business and his way of living. In the future, he plans to open his own water pump shop.

loans.use: to purchase the needed equipment for his business such as pipe lines, keys and others.

loans.name: Hakim

texts.ru: Хаким житель города Худжанд. Ему 43 года. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Он по специальности водитель. Уже 12 лет как он работает по специальности. Хаким развозит пассажиров по маршруту №17. Он берет кредит для приобретения запчастей и ремонта машины.
texts.en: Hakim is a resident of the city Khujand. He is 43 years old. He is married and has four children. He is a driver by profession. He has already worked 12 years in this profession. Hakim transports passengers on route number 17. He takes out a loan to purchase spare parts and repair his vehicle.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and repair his vehicle

loans.name: Ilhom

texts.ru: Илхом проживает в городе Куляб. Возраст, 28 лет. Женат. Имеет одного ребенка. Более четырех лет занимается торговлей. У него имеется продуктовый магазин. Он берет кредит для покупки необходимых продуктов.
texts.en: Ilhom lives in Kulob. He is 28 years old and married. He has one child. For more than four years he has been working with retail. He owns a grocery store. He takes a loan for the purchase of necessary products.

loans.use: to purchase products for his grocery store

loans.name: Khadicha

texts.ru: Хадича жительница района Шахритус. Ей 42 года. Она замужем. У нее пятеро детей. Хадича более пяти лет занимается торговлей. На сегодняшний день у нее имеется собственная торговая точка на центральном рынке района. Она берет кредит для покупки женской теплой одежды.
texts.en: Khadicha is a resident of the region Shahrituz. She is 42 years old and married. She has five children. Khadicha has worked in retail for more than five years. Today she owns her own sales outlet in the central market of the region. She takes a loan for the purchase of warm clothing for women.

loans.use: to purchase warm clothing for women

loans.name: George

texts.en: George is 53 years old and married with eight children. He runs an automobile mechanic shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for 30 years and has employed five people. He earns extra income from his farming activities. Since he joined Faulu Kenya he has been able to save his income. He hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for a loan of 80,000 Kenyan shillings to buy motor vehicle spare parts.

loans.use: to buy motor vehicle spare parts

loans.name: Joshua

texts.en:
Joshua is 41 years old and married. He has five children. 

He runs a photography shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for 14 years and he describes his business environment as favorable because there is little competition. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his business. He hopes to be financially stable in the future. 

He has applied for 90,000 KES to buy a digital camera.

loans.use: To buy a digital camera.

loans.name: Mahmudjon

texts.ru: Махмудчон житель города Худжанд. Ему 41 год. Он женат. У него трое детей. Он занимается торговлей. В основном Махмудчон продает фрукты. Этим видом деятельности занимается пять лет. На сегодняшний день Махмудчон хочет заняться еще и скотоводством у себя дома. В этом ему поможет его жена. Он берет кредит для закупа несколько голов крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Mahmudjon is a resident of the Khujand region. He is 41 years old, married and has three children. He is in retail business. Mainly Mahmudjon sells fruits. He has been in this business for five years. Currently Mahmudjon with his wife's help wants to engage in animal husbandry business.  He is taking out the loan to buy several heads of large horned cattle.

loans.use: to purchase several heads of cattle.

loans.name: Peter Kamande

texts.en:
Peter Kamande is still providing motorcycle transport, and he has repaid his previous loans well and in good time. His monthly income has increased to KES 6,500 and the business is doing well.

Peter is applying for a third loan term with KADET. He will use the loan to buy spare parts for his motorbike. Peter plans to use the anticipated profit from the business to educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to buy a piece of land and build rental houses.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his motorbike.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 36 years old, married, and has two children. He repairs motorcycles to earn a living, which he has been doing for four years, and employs two people. 

Samuel is requesting a loan for 80,000 KES, which he will use to buy motorcycle tires.  Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income.  Samuel hopes to expand his business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase motorcycle tires.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis is 34 years old and married with two children, ages 4 and 5. He runs a laundry shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for nine years and has employed two people. He earns extra income from his rental houses. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to grow his business. He hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for a loan of 100,000 Kenyan shillings to buy a washing machine.

loans.use: to buy a washing machine

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is 62 years old, married, and has six children. He sells food items such as tea and loaves of bread to earn a living, which he has been doing for 15 years, and employs two people. He also earns extra income from farming. 

Francis is requesting a loan for 50,000 KES, which he will use to buy sugar, tea leaves, and loaves of bread. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to expand his business and hopes to be financially stable in the future.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, tea leaves, and loaves of bread.

loans.name: Musa

texts.en: Musa is 38 years old and married with 4 children. He sells household goods such as plates, cups and spoons to earn a living. He has been in the business for 11 years and has employed 3 people. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, Musa has been able to save his income. He hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 80,000 Kenya Shillings to buy plates, cups and spoons.

loans.use: to buy plates, cups and spoons

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is 33 years old and married with three children, ages 2, 6 and 10. He runs a tailoring shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for 3 years and has employed 2 people. He describes his business environment as favorable because there is limited competition. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, John has been able to save his income. He hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 70,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a tailoring machine.

loans.use: to buy a tailoring machine

loans.name: Oyunbaatar

texts.en:
Oyunbaatar, 40, is a taxi driver who has been running his business since July around the districts of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has already gained enough experience to continue his business into the future. Oyunbaatar lives with his 3 children and his wife in his brother’s house.

Oyunbaatar's wife recently started a new business, a textile shop, with her sister in the rental apartment. The preparation is going well, but some sewing tools and raw materials are still needed to get completely started. She needs exactly MNT 2,500,000 to purchase these items. Therefore Oyunbaatar is requesting a loan to support his wife by purchasing textile materials, a sewing machine and other tools to start her new business.

loans.use: To support his wife by purchasing textile materials, a sewing machine and other tools to start her new business.

loans.name: Daudi

texts.en:
Daudi, aged  59, is married to Rose. He runs a retail shop and a hotel that have been in operation for four years. The business earns him a monthly income of KES 24,000.

This is Daudi's fifth loan term with KADET; he has successfully repaid the previous loans. He will use the funds to buy cereals, sugar, cooking oil and bread for resale. Daudi hopes to open a modern restaurant in the future.

loans.use: To buy cereals, cooking oil, bread and sugar

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon, aged 29 years, is married to Ann and is blessed with one child. He runs a retail shop that has been giving him a monthly income of Kes.12,000.

This is his fourth loan with KADET and he has a good credit history. He will use the funds to buy 10 bags of sugar, rice, cooking oil, wheat and maize flour for sale. Simon hopes to open a supermarket in future.

loans.use: To buy 10 bags of sugar, rice, cooking oil, wheat and maize flour

loans.name: Carlos Humberto

texts.es: El señor Carlos Humberto a sus 44 años de edad es padre de dos hijos de 16 y 10 años, se dedica a la jardinería y en sus tiempos libres atiende una tienda que hace 4 años compro con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos y así la calidad de vida de su familia. En su tienda le ayuda un amigo quien trabaja en el tiempo en el cual el señor Carlos Humberto se encuentra ocupado con su trabajo alterno. El señor Carlos Humberto aun debe su tienda para lo cual necesita de capital para poderla cancelar y así sea de su total propiedad, además surtirla para ofrecer mejores productos a sus clientes y ha futuro convertir su tienda en un mini mercado y ofrecer a sus hijos una buena educación.
texts.en:
Carlos Humberto, 44, is the father of two children who are 16 and 10 years old.  He is a gardener and in his free time he tends to a store that be bought four years ago in order to improve his income and his family’s quality of life.  A friend of his helps him in the store; he works at the store when Carlos Humberto is busy with his other job.  

Carlos Humberto is still paying off his store so he needs capital to pay off the loan so that the store will be totally his property.  In addition, he will stock it with better products for his customers and in the future turn it into a mini market and provide his children with a good education.

loans.use: to pay off the loan he used to buy his store and to buy stock merchandise.

loans.name: Vincet

texts.en:
Vincet is a forty-seven-year-old married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. For four years he has been operating a retail shop. He started with an initial capital of 500,000 UGX but now his working capital is 3,000,000 UGX. 

His challenge is having inadequate capital to meet the big market demand and his dream is to have a wholesale shop. Vincet needs the loan facility to buy soap and sugar to sell.

loans.use: to buy soap and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Edwin Dagoberto

texts.es:
Edwin trabaja con mucha aspiración en su negocio ya que ayudo a su familia a mejorar y poder construir mejor la casa. Por eso quiere que su servicio de venta de comida mejore. 

Trabaja con una empleada quien le ayuda a cocinar la comida típica que requiere su clientela. Tiene muchas aspiraciones de continuar con su negocio ya que le ha ayudado a mejorar económicamente su familia. 

Por eso requiere con el préstamo comprar carnes, legumbres, granos, bebidas, frutas para hacer jugos naturales etc.
texts.en:
Edwin has a cement house located along Guayaquil’s Beltway.  Years ago Edwin worked for many years in a country estate and spent long periods of time away from home and couldn’t help nor accompany his mother in her food selling business.  He decided to invest in more food to prepare.

Now, Edwin works delivering food with his mother who helps him by cooking the food.  They sell dishes with potatoes, noodles and bananas and include juice or colas according to customers’ wishes.  One of his greatest difficulties is the robbers on buses; he is not married and has no children.

He wants to use the loan to buy rice, plantains and meats to prepare more dishes.  In the future, he wants to set up a stand with everything necessary for food and also do some improvements to his mother’s house.

loans.use: carnes, legumbres, granos, bebidas

loans.name: Bartola Lorena

texts.es:
Bartola de 33 años es una mujer trabajadora que comenzó como vendedora de cosméticos y joyas para poder ayudar con los gastos familiares ya que tiene 4 hijos. 

Comenzó a vender cosméticos desde las 08h00am hasta las 19h00pm para mejorar sus ingresos.  Durante algunos años ha trabajado para poder ayudar con los gastos familiares. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere comprar con el préstamo cosméticos, aretes. 

En el futuro quiere tener su local establecido.
texts.en:
Bartola, 33, is a hardworking woman who began selling cosmetics and jewelry to be able to help with the family expenses because she has four children.  She began to sell cosmetics from 8 a.m. until 7 p.m. to improve her income.  For several years she has worked to be able to help with the family expenses.

She has many goals with her business, so she wants to buy cosmetics and earrings with the loan.  She wants to set up a store in the future.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and earrings.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy spare parts to sell.

loans.name: Nidia

texts.es:
Nidia ha sido una persona muy trabajadora durante toda su vida debido a que proviene de una familia que no tiene una gran capacidad económica. Gracias a esta cualidad tan importante en su vida, Nidia ha podido salir adelante en la vida, a tal punto que actualmente se encuentra casada y es madre de un hijo. Con su esposo, Nidia tomó una tienda en la cual trabajan desde hace un año, y gracias a esta obtienen los ingresos necesarios para sostener los gastos de su hogar. Nidia siempre ha querido que su hijo pueda tener la mejor educación posible, pero por sus bajos ingresos no le ha podido obsequiar esto.
Nidia tiene un gran inconveniente en su tienda y es que no tiene una carpa para taparse de las lluvias, por lo que cada vez que comienza a llover debe cerrar su negocio para que no se le llene de agua. Con el ánimo de que esta situación cambie, Nidia busca un préstamo que le permita comprar una carpa para tapar su negocio de las lluvias y no tener que cerrar cada vez que llueva. Nidia manifiesta que de esta manera sus ingresos aumentarán considerablemente debido a que tendrá su negocio abierto durante más horas al día, y gracias a la buena ubicación del mismo las personas lo tendrá como referencia y se podrá posicionar en su sector.
Nidia espera que con el incremento de sus ingresos, pueda mejorar su calidad de vida actual y poder ahorrar para que un futuro pueda cumplir el sueño de brindarle a su hijo la mejor educación posible y que de esta manera pueda obtener un trabajo que le genere más ingresos que los que genera ella en su negocio.
texts.en:
Nidia has been a very hardworking person all her life because she comes from a family with little economic capacity.  Thanks to this important quality in her life, Nidia has been able to get ahead in life to such an extent that she now finds herself married and the mother of a son.  With her husband, Nidia took a store that they’ve both been working at for a year.  Thanks to it they earn the necessary income to cover household expenses.  Nidia has always wanted her son to have the best possible education but her low income has not allowed her to offer this.

Nidia faces a large inconvenience because her store does not have a tent over it to protect it from the rain so that every time it starts to rain she has to close the store so that it won’t fill up with water.  Hoping that this situation can change, Nidia is seeking a loan that will allow her to buy a tent to cover the store and protect it from the rain so that she doesn’t have to close every time it rains.  Nidia states that this way her income will increase considerably because she’ll have the store open more hours per day and thanks to its good location people will relate to it and lead to its better positioning in her sector.

Nidia hopes that with the increase in her income she’ll be able to improve her current quality of life and be able to save so that she can reach her dream in the future of providing her son with the best possible education so that he can get a job that will generate more income than what she earns in the store.

loans.use: to buy a tent to protect herself from the rain.

loans.name: Javier Mauricio

texts.es: Javier Mauricio ha recibido el negocio de tradición familiar que es el transporte de mercancía, mudanzas y demás en el camión que ha sido propiedad de sus tíos y su padre desde hace varios años. Javier Mauricio ha trabajado desde muy pequeño, pues a los 10 años aprendió a manejar porque siempre le ayudaba a cargar en el camión a su padre, y cuando cumplió los 18 años recibió el negocio y empezó a manejar el camión y a responder por el negocio. A sus 36 años de edad, Javier Mauricio sigue trabajando en la misma actividad y gracias a esta ha podido sacar a sus padres adelante, pues ya tienen una edad que no se les es fácil trabajar. Javier Mauricio sueña con que sus padres tengan una mejor calidad de vida y para esto quiere aumentar sus ingresos, sin embargo, el camión en el que trabaja ha estado presentando fallas en el motor y esto ha hecho que desista de algunos contratos con algunos clientes. Javier Mauricio aspira entonces a un préstamo que le permita repara su motor y hacerle mantenimiento a otras partes de su camión de modo que pueda trabajar con mayor eficiencia y pueda obtener mas contratos por parte de sus clientes. Javier Mauricio espera que así sus ingresos se incrementen y pueda cumplir el sueño de que sus padres y el tengan una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Javier Mauricio has received the business that’s his family tradition: merchandise transportation and moving services.  The truck has belonged to his uncles and his father for several years.  Javier Mauricio has worked since he was a little boy; he learned how to drive when he was 10 years old because he always helped his father load the truck and when he turned 18 he received the business and started driving the truck and responding to the business.

At the age of 36 Javier Mauricio continues working in the same activity an thanks to it has been able to move his parents ahead since they are now of an age when work is difficult for them.  Javier Mauricio dreams with his parents having a better quality of life and this is why he wants to increase his income.  However, the truck is starting to have some mechanical difficulties in the engine and this has led him to decline some customer contracts.  Javier Mauricio hopes then that a loan will allow him to repair the engine and to service other parts of the truck so that he can work more efficiently and be able to secure more customer contracts.  Javier Mauricio hopes his income will increase so that he can reach his dream of providing his parents a better quality of life.

loans.use: to repair his truck's motor and to service other parts of it too.

loans.name: Fabiola Amalia

texts.es: Emprendedora es la mejor palabra con la que se puede identificar a Fabiola, pues desde hace 6 años y sin importar su edad decidió tomar un curso de fabricación de detergentes, y desde entonces se ha dedicado a la elaboración de detergentes principalmente el límpido, y gracias a esto ha podido generar los ingresos con los que sostiene los gastos del hogar donde convive con su esposo. Fabiola, con 51 años de edad, no tuvo unos padres con una capacidad económica estable, y tuvo que pasar por muchas circunstancias adversas en su vida, es por esto que ahora quiere tener una estabilidad económica gracias al negocio que emprendió desde hace 6 años. Fabiola cuenta con unos clientes fijos en su sector que le hacen pedidos constantemente, pero presenta el problema de que sus clientes no siempre le pagan de contado y tiene que ver como su negocio frena su ritmo de producción por la falta de dinero. Es por esto que Fabiola aspira a que con un préstamo pueda comprar insumos necesarios para su producción como los son los envases y entre otros productos y también comprar una vitrina que le permita exhibir sus productos desde su vivienda, así generará mayores ventas y por ende mayores ingresos. Fabiola aspira que con el incremento en sus ventas pueda cumplir el sueño de expandir su negocio y vender a tiendas de otros barrios de su municipio.
texts.en:
"Entrepreneur" is the best word to describe Fabiola. Despite her age, she took a course six years ago to learn how to make detergent. Since then, she has dedicated herself to this activity and with the business income, Fabiola is able to cover household expenses for the home she shares with her husband. Fabiola is 51 years old. Her parents did not have stable income when she was young and the family struggled with many difficult financial situations. That's why Fabiola is so motivated now to create financial stability for her family. 

She has many loyal customers who consistently order from her, but unfortunately her customers often pay on credit and Fabiola struggles to maintain enough working capital to keep her business running. For this reason, Fabiola is requesting a working capital loan to finance her production. She would also like to buy a case to display her products from her home. This loan will allow her to improve her sales and earn more income. Fabiola hopes this will allow her to expand her business and sell detergent to stores in other neighborhoods in her municipality.

loans.use: To buy materials for making detergents and to buy a display case for her products.

loans.name: Vicente Azael

texts.es: Don Vicente habitante de El coral, Comarca el Granadino, se desempeña como consejal de la Alcaldia, tambien es propietario de su propia finca y su inventario ganadero, actividades que conforman su principal fuente de ingreso para el bienestar de su familia,  las actividades del campo las realiza en conjunto con su esposa y sus hijos, requiere de este financiamiento para invertirlo en algunas mejoras en su casa de habitacion, como puesta de seramica y pinturas a la misma, esto le permitira gozar de mejores condiciones de vida en conjunto con su familia, referencias en su localidad lo consideran como una persona responsable, de buenas culturas y ademas progresivo, espera ser beneficiado con este financiamiento para poder llevar a cabo su preyecto anhelado, solicito se le apruebe el monto solicitado.
texts.en: Don Vicente lives in El Coral, in the region of Granadino, and works as an advisor to the mayor's office. He also owns his own farm and livestock, activities that make up his main source of income for the well-being of his family. His agricultural activities are accomplished together with his wife and children, and he needs this financing to invest in some improvements to his house. He needs to lay down tile and also do some painting, and this will allow him to enjoy better living conditions, along with his family. References in his community consider him to be a responsible person, well-mannered, and also progressive. He hopes to benefit from this financing to be able to bring his yearned-for project to a close; I ask that the requested amount be approved.

loans.use: to lay down tile.

loans.name: Tadeo

texts.en: Tadeo is a twenty-eight-year-old, hardworking man living in Fort Portal, Uganda.  For a year he has been operating a bar, after having been a waiter for over six years.  He faces challenges of price fluctuation and high taxes levied on him.  His personal goal is to buy a motorcycle for himself and his business goal is to have a modern bar.  With this loan, Tadeo intends to buy a pool table for his bar.

loans.use: to buy a pool table for his bar.

loans.name: John Jairo

texts.es: John  de 34 años  compra y vende artículos de segunda, tales como rejas, puertas y ventanas, que en manos de pintores y trabajadores de la madera, en su negocio repara y pule para luego venderlas a un buen precio; actividad con la que la logrado sostener a su familia, compuesta por su esposa y sus 2 hijos en las edades de 8 a 15 años. Hace más de 6 años incursionó en este mercado, por primera vez con un préstamo que le hizo su padre, pues esté quiera que su hijo se dedicara al trabajo independiente, porque se había quedado desempleado de una importante empresa de la ciudad, donde trabajaba como conductor. Así fue como inició y hasta la presente se siente con el impulso de seguir creciendo como emprendedor, por eso planea en un futuro vender artículos nuevos, pues conoce los precios de las mercancías de segunda y fácilmente puede abordar este nuevo mercado. En la actualidad está aplicando a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará mercancías, para la temporada de fin de año que se acerca y le falta surtido y un capital para abordar su creciente clientela.
texts.en:
John, aged 34, buys and sells second-hand items such as railings, doors and windows which he repairs in the hands of the painters and wood-workers in his business.  He then takes them and sells them at a good price, an activity which has been able to support his family.  His family is made up of his wife and his two children aged 8 and 15.

Has been working in this field for more than six years.  He began with a loan from his father, as he wanted his son to work independently because he had lost his job at an important company in the city where he worked as a conductor.  This was how he started, and since then he has felt the impulse to continue growing as an entrepreneur.  For this reason, he is planning on selling new items in the future, as he knows the prices of second-hand merchandise, and can easily take on this new market.

He is currently apply for this Kiva loan, which is his first financing through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  With the loan, he will purchase merchandise for the year-end season which is approaching, and he lacks the stock and capital to supply his growing customer base.

loans.use: to buy tables, doors, and other wooden items.

loans.name: Boir

texts.ru: Боир женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Более 25 лет Боир занимается  реализацией мёда. Он получает хороший мед.  Кроме того он занимается откормом скота и выращиванием арбуза, дины и другие сельхозкультуры. Жена занимается домохозяйством, а друг помогает ему в бизнесе. Имеет дополнительный доход, который получает от сыновей, которые уехали в Россию на заработки. Боир хотел бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений и оплатить за аренду земли.
texts.en: Boir is married and is raising three children.  He has been involved in selling honey for over 25 years.  He obtains good honey.  Besides this, Boir is involved in fattening up livestock and growing watermelon, honeydew and other agricultural crops.  His wife is involved in household work, and his friend helps him with the business.  Boir has an additional income, which he receives from his sons, who left to work in Russia.  Boir wants to obtain a loan to purchase mineral fertilizers and pay for land lease.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and pay for land lease

loans.name: Rabih

texts.en:
Rabih is a 36-year-old, married Lebanese man who lives with his wife and their one child. Their child attends school. He combines forces with his wife in order to pay their child’s education fees.

In 2010, he opened a small café, where people can have a soft drink and enjoy a hubble-bubble. He has quickly built up the business and is looking forward to further expanding his business.

Now, he is requesting a loan in the amount of $1,300 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase additional products such as soft drinks, charcoal and other items. He notes that this will help him attract more customers. In the future, he plans to open his own restaurant.

loans.use: to attract more customers by purchasing additional products such as soft drinks and charcoal

loans.name: Fatmeh

texts.en: Fatmeh is a 49-year-old Lebanese married woman who lives with her husband. They’re both working really hard to cover the heavy costs of life. For that reason, she decided to open her own home products shop in 1993. She is looking forward to further develop her shop. She sells high tech products at fair prices, which makes her customers loyal to her. Today, she’s asking to borrow $2200 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to buy additional home supplies for her shop such as refrigerators, televisions, plastic supplies and many other items. She’s sure that buying these new supplies will help her earn superior income. In the future, she plans to work as a wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy additional items for her shop such as refrigerators, televisions, plastic supplies and many other items

loans.name: Ibrohim

texts.ru: Иброхим более 10 лет занимается купле- продажей веников. Он женат и имеет двух детей. Он сам занимается этим бизнесом и усердно работает. Приобретает товар в Узбекистане. Иброхим хочет улучшить свои жилищные условия и увеличить свой оборотный капитал. Иброхим хотел бы получить займ в размере 3000 Сомони для увлечения оборотного капитала с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Ibrohim has been involved in buying and selling brooms.  He is married and has two children.  He himself is involved in this business and works diligently.  He buys his merchandise from Uzbekistan.  Ibrohim wants to improve his living conditions and increase his working capital.  Ibrohim wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 3000 Somoni to increase his working capital in order to expand his business.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to expand his business

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is a 38-year-old, married Lebanese man living with his wife and two children. Their children currently attend school.

He is the main income provider in his family, and he is always looking for new ways to meet his family's needs. Since 1987, he has been working as a car repairman.

Currently, he is seeking to borrow $2,900 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to improve his old equipment and to buy new supplies and painting tools. He expects that this loan will improve his business and, as a result, his family's standard of living. In the future, he plans to request more Kiva loans in order to enlarge his garage and to thereby serve more clients.

loans.use: to improve his old equipment and to buy new supplies and tools

loans.name: Abduvosit

texts.ru: Абдувосит активный и целеустремленный молодой парень. Более трех лет он занимается предоставлением транспортных услуг. От данного бизнеса он получает хороший доход и от полученной прибыли построил  для себя дом. А теперь хотел бы получить займ для завершения ремонта своего дома. Он надеется на вашу поддержку и милосердие.
texts.en: Abduvosit is an active and goal-oriented young man.  He has been involved in providing transportation services for over three years.  He earns a good income from this business and built himself a house from received profits.  And now Abduvosit wants to obtain a loan to complete repairs for his house.  He relies on your support and mercy.

loans.use: to repair his house

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 37-year-old, married Lebanese man living with his wife and their two school-age children.

He is the one that takes care of the family and covers their living expenses. Ali started his own business in 1997 as a car mechanic in his garage. He has a solid number of customers that seek his services on a regular basis.

Currently, he is asking for a loan in the amount of $2,900 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to buy new mechanical tools for his business as well as an electrical generator in order to be able to respond quickly to his clients’ problems. He believes that providing prompt and quality service is essential to both maintain and attract new customers. In the future, he plans to open his own car show room.

loans.use: to meet customers' needs by purchasing new tools and a generator for his business

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 44-year-old Lebanese married man, living with his wife and two children, who both attend school.  He strives to work hard to be able to satisfy his family's needs. He has been working as an independent taxi driver since 1996, and is really lucky to have such a good job. 

Today, he is in need of a loan of $1600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to perform necessary maintenance on his car's engine and pay its fees. This will certainly improve his business and help him attract more customers. In the future, he plans to buy a minivan and target a wider range of customers.

loans.use: to perform necessary maintenance on his car's engine and pay its fees.

loans.name: Lavinia Dora

texts.es: La señora Lavinia  se dedica desde hace diez años al comercio de artefactos eléctricos,  que trae desde la ciudad de Oruro, tiene una lista de clientes que son los que hacen los pedidos, ella entrega al contado,  crédito que entrega y después va a cobrar ya sea quincenal o mensual, vive en domicilio familiar con su hermano y sus padres en el km 3,5 de la zona de la Blanco Galindo,  necesita el crédito para aumentar el capital que fue haciendo a través de los años comprando mercadería en artefactos eléctricos  y en variedad de productos es soltera  y todos sus ingresos los destina en reinvertir y también  ayuda con algunos gastos en su hogar, es una persona muy responsable amable y trabajadora que se siente feliz por la oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en: Lavinia has maintained a business selling electric appliances for the last 10 years, buying these items in the city Oruro.  She has a list of client orders, and she brings the products back for them, paying up front. Her clients pay in bi-weekly or monthly installments.  She lives at home with her brother and parents at km 3.5 in the area of Blanco Galindo.  She needs this loan to increase her capital accumulated over years buying  electric appliances and varied products.  She is single and will re-invest her profits as well as help with household expenses. She is a friendly and hard-working person, and is pleased with the opportunity offered to her.

loans.use: have a base of capital to buy electric appliances

loans.name: Nayandra

texts.es: La Sra. Nayandra  vive en la zona del plan 3000 en casa familiar. Ella tiene cuatro hijos que se encuentra en edad escolar, la Sra. Nayandra es promotora de venta de cosméticos,  ropa por catalogo y  zapatos,  también trabaja medio tiempo en una panadería  es cliente que le toca su quinta secuencia en la institución es una cliente antigua, comenzó en bancas de emprendimiento, luego en grupos solidarios y este es su primer crédito individual,  ella  ha demostrado un buen comportamiento de pago,  el crédito que esta solicitando es para aumentar su capital de trabajo, compra de cosméticos y ropa que se encuentra de promoción, ya que por las fiestas de fin de año tiene mucha demanda,  la Sra. Nayandra es una persona trabajadora, con ganas de superación para darles un futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en: Nayandra lives in the plan 3000 zone in a family home. She has four children who are school age. Nayandra is a promoter of cosmetic sales, catalog clothing, and shoes. She also works part time in a bakery. She is a member who will be in her fifth sequence with the institution. She is an old member, she began with the communal banks, and then went to solidarity groups, and now this is her first individual loan. She has demonstrated good payment responsibility. The loan she is requesting is to increase her working capital and buy cosmetics and clothing that is on sale; because of all the end of year parties, she has a lot of demand. She is a hard working person, with the desire to better herself to give her children a future.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es: Rafael es una persona que siempre ha querido mantener a sus padres con la mejor calidad de vida posible, pues desde hace algún tiempo sus padres están bajo su responsabilidad debido a que se encuentran en una edad que les es difícil trabajar. Rafael genera los ingresos necesarios para su hogar con la actividad de la agricultura, actividad que desarrolla desde hace varios años pero que no le permite tener grandes ingresos, pues la competencia en su región es muy fuerte; por esto, Rafael alterna esta actividad con la de las tiendas generales. La tienda que tiene Rafael no es muy grande y le genera unos pocos ingresos a los que le suma los ingresos generados por la agricultura y así puede sostener los gastos suyos y los de sus padres. Con el ánimo de generar mayores ingresos para sostener sus padres, Rafael quiere surtir una tienda que arrendó hace algunos días, por esto está en busca de un préstamo que le permita comprar el surtido como legumbres, aceite, granos, detergente, gaseosas y licor. Rafael aspira que con esta nueva tienda se aumenten sus ingresos considerablemente y pueda cumplir su sueño de tener sus padres en una condición mucho mejor a la actual, y también mejorar su calidad de vida permitiéndose disfrutar un poco de lo fuerte que ha trabajado durante toda su vida.
texts.en: Rafael is a person who has always wanted to support his parents with the best quality of life possible, for awhile now his parents have been his responsibility since they are at an age when its difficult for them to work. He makes the necessary income for his household through agriculture, an activity that he has been involved with for several years now but that does not allow him to make a large income. The competition in his region is very strong; this is why, he alternates this activity with a general store. The store that he has is not very large, it gives him little income that he adds to the income from agriculture, and in this manner, he can support his expenses and those of his parents. In an effort to support his parents, he wants to stock a store that he leased a few days ago. This is why he is searching for a loan that will allow him to buy merchandise such as vegetables, oils, grains, detergent, soft drinks, and liquor. He hopes that with this new store he will be able to increase his income considerably and be able to fulfill his dream of having his parents in a much better condition and improve his quality of life allowing him to enjoy a little from the hard work he has done all his life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as vegetables, oils, detergents, grains and liquor.

loans.name: Pedro Hernan

texts.es:
Don Pedro tiene 55 años de edad,  vive en unión libre y es padre de 4 hijos.
Pedro se dedica al comercio, tiene 3 años de tener su negocio, su actividad principal es la compra y venta de chatarra y todo material reciclable.
el Sr. Pedro utilizara el credito para comprar  cobre y material reciclable para revender y así obtener mas ganancias para el sustento de su hogar. 
todo lo que compra lo transporta en su vehiculo., nos comento que se siente muy feliz ya que todo le esta saliendo bien y que sus ingresos estan mejorando.
texts.en:
Father of four, Pedro, is 55 years old and is in a free union relationship.
Pedro has been running his own business for the last 3 years, in which he primarily buys and sells scrap metal and other recyclable materials. He plans to use this loan to buy copper and recyclable materials to re-sell in order to increase his earnings, which he will use to provide for his family. He transports everything he buys in his truck. He told us that he is very happy as everything is turning out well and his income is improving.

loans.use: to buy scrap metal.

loans.name: Sorangel

texts.es: Dedicación y amor por su familia son la mejor manera de reconocer a Sorangel, una mujer que a sus 52 años siempre ha buscado la manera de que sus 4 hijos y su esposo tengan la mejor calidad de vida posible. Desde su último embarazo, hace cerca de 20 años, Sorangel inició con la actividad de la venta de productos en su tienda general, y gracias a esta ha podido sufragar los gastos de su hogar. Gracias a que su negocio ha tenido una muy buena acogida, su surtido se ha venido rebajando considerablemente por lo que Sorangel requiere de la compra de más surtido para su negocio. Sin embargo, Sorangel no dispone del capital necesario, por lo que aspira a que con un préstamo pueda acceder a surtir su negocio con la mercancía que sus clientes siempre le piden. Sorangel aspira que con su tienda bien surtida se incrementen sus ventas y por ende sus ingresos, y poder así cumplir su sueño de brindarles a sus hijos una buena estabilidad económica en un futuro y que puedan acceder a la mejor educación posible.
texts.en: Dedication and love for her family are the best ways to describe Sorangel, a woman who at age 52 has always looked for a way to help her 4 children and husband to get the best quality of life possible. Since her last pregnancy almost 20 years ago, Sorangel launched her general store, and thanks to this business, she has been able to cover the household expenses. Because her business has been successful, her products have been running considerably low, which is why Sorangel needs to purchase more products. However, she does not have the necessary capital, which is why she hopes that with this loan, she will be able to restock her shop with the merchandise that her customers always ask for. Sorangel hopes that with a well-stocked shop, sales will increase and in so doing, so will her profits. Thus, she will be able to obtain her dream of providing her children with financial stability in the future, and that they will be able to gain access to the best education possible.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her shop and meet customer demand.

loans.name: Farrukh

texts.ru: Фаррух 29-летний парень рабочего класса, женат и имеет 1-го ребенка. Занимается услугами по ремонту автомашин и арендует цех,где работает с одним партнером.Его цех находится в центре города у главной дороги,где много клиентов и ежедневно он обслуживает в среднем по 18-20 автомашин.Работает в нашей организации более двух лет и использовал кредит на потребительские цели,на коммерческие цели и т.д. Живет Фаррух с родителями и он постоянносоветуется с отцом,так как молодой и имеет небольшой опыт.Жена Фарруха- Холнисо помогает семье,занимаясь пошивом национальных платьев и вносит свой небольшой вклад в семейный бюджет.Сейчас Фаррух хочет расширить свой цех и покупает новую технику для вулканизации и запрашивает новый кредит
texts.en: Farrukh is a 29 year-old young man of the working class, married and has one child.  He is involved in providing auto repair services and leases a work space, where he works with one partner.  His work space is located by the main road in the city center, where there are many clients, and Farrukh servers on average 18-20 cars per day.  He has been working with our organization for over two years and used loans for consumer needs, commercial goals, etc.  Farrukh lives with his parents and constantly seeks advice from his father because Farrukh is young and does not have a lot of experience.  His wife, Holniso, helps the family by sewing national dresses and provides her small input to the family budget.  Currently, Farrukh wants to expand his work space and is buying new equipment for tire vulcanization, and is requesting a new loan.

loans.use: to purchase new equipment

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es: Emprendedor y dedicado a su familia son las dos mejores palabras para identificar a Luis Enrique, que con sus 52 años tiene un negocio de confección el cual le genera los ingresos necesarios para el sustento de sus 6 hijos y su esposa. Hace 23 años Luis Enrique decidió emprender su propio negocio de confección, y actualmente su negocio sigue creciendo y ofreciendo productos de muy buena calidad. El sueño de Luis Enrique siempre fue tener un negocio que le pueda generar ingresos necesarios con los cuales pueda atender las necesidades de su familia, y con el que pueda brindar empleo a las personas que más lo necesitan. Gracias a este negocio, Luis Enrique ha podido brindarles a sus 6 hijos todo lo que han necesitado y no han tenido que pasar por circunstancias adversas como si lo tuvo que hacer el en su tiempo. Luis Enrique tiene muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes, pero a veces no puede abastecerlos todos por falta de materia prima para su producto; actualmente presenta la misma situación y requiere de la compra de la materia prima para abastecer los pedidos de sus clientes, sin embargo, en el momento no dispone del capital necesario, por lo que aspira a que un crédito le permita acceder a la compra de esta materia prima y pueda seguir cumpliendo con todos los pedidos de sus clientes. Luis Enrique sueña con que su negocio siga creciendo y que su familia pueda encontrar en el una buena oportunidad de empleo y generación de ingresos.
texts.en:
Enterprising and dedicated to his family are the two best ways to describe Luis Enrique who at the age of 52 has a sewing business that generates the income necessary to support his six children and his wife.  Luis Enrique decided to start his own sewing business 23 years ago and his business continues growing to this day offering very good quality products.

Luis Enrique’s dream is to always have a business that will generate the income necessary to tend to all his family’s needs and that he can use to offer employment to those who need it most.  Thanks to this business, Luis Enrique has been able to provide his six children with everything they’ve needed and they have not had to go through any adverse circumstances like he had to at some point in the past.  

Luis Enrique has good pending orders from customers but sometimes he’s unable to fill them for lack of raw materials for his products.  He’s currently in that same situation and needs to buy raw materials to fill all his customer orders.  However, at present he lacks the necessary capital to do so which is why he’s hoping for a loan that will allow him to access raw materials to continue filling customer orders.  Luis Enrique dreams with his business continuing to grow and that his family can find good opportunities for employment and income generation.

loans.use: to buy raw materials.

loans.name: Wissam

texts.en:
Wissam is a 29-year-old single man. He has worked in car maintenance for ten years and opened his shop in 2007. His business is going fine.

Wissam is a hard worker and he is well-known in the region. His business still needs to be updated with new, improved machines and equipment.

This is Wissam's second cycle as an Al Majmoua borrower, with a good standing history of paying back.

He is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua  in order to buy new necessary machines for his business, in addition to a highly-requested power generator necessary for his business.

He hopes to expand his business in the future and open a big car maintenance company.

loans.use: to buy necessary equipment for his business.

loans.name: Gabriel De Jesus

texts.es: Gabriel siempre ha querido tener un trabajo en el que pueda tener una estabilidad económica y pueda ofrecerle una buena calidad de vida a su esposa y sus 4 hijos. Es por esto que inició con el negocio de su tienda general desde hace algún tiempo, pues estaba dedicado a la actividad de la construcción y no tenía grandes oportunidades de empleo. Con su tienda como la fuente de sus ingresos, Gabriel ha visto como esta actividad le puede generar una mayor estabilidad económica y mayores oportunidades de progreso para el y su familia.
